skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: I am a dedicated frontend developer with a strong foundation on HTML, CSSMAND JavaScript. My primary expertise lies in crafting intutitive and visually appealing user interfaces using modern frontend framework React.js.Contineous learning is integral to professional growth, and i stay updated with latest trend and technologies in frontend development.

skills.title: Backend
skills.description: I am a dedicated backend developer with a passion for crafting robust, and effecient server-side solutions. I've a basic foundation of Node.js.

skills.title: web developer
